text: Abdur Rouf (আবদুর রউফ) is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the incumbent Member of Parliament from Kushtia-4. ==Career== Rouf was elected to Parliament on 5 January 2014 from Kushtia-4 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate. On 4 July 2015, he prevented Brazilian wheat from entering the Kumarkhali Upazila Food department warehouse. The wheat had been imported by the government of Bangladesh for its social safety net program. According to Rouf, the wheat was substandard and had not been tested. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Khulna Division Category:1954 births
title: Abdur Rouf
